## Definition

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="45%"}
$$\color{purple}{y} = \color{red}{b}^\color{blue}{x}$$
```{r}

x1 <- seq(1,10)

y1 = exp(x1)

plot(x1, 
     y1,
     xlab = "x", 
     ylab = "y", 
     pch = 19, 
     col = "purple", 
     main = expression(e^x == y),
     cex = 2.0, cex.lab = 2.0, cex.main = 2.0)

```
:::

::: {.column width="5%"}
$$\iff$$
:::

::: {.column width="45%"}
$$\color{blue}{x} = \log_\color{red}{b}(\color{purple}{y})$$
```{r}

x2 <- seq(1,10)

y2 = log(x2)

plot(x2, 
     y2,
     xlab = "y", 
     ylab = "x", 
     pch = 19, 
     col = "blue", 
     main = expression(x == ln(y)),
     cex = 2.0, cex.lab = 2.0, cex.main = 2.0)

```
:::
